LearnBayes 2.15.1

Random number generation for inverse gamma distribution

rigamma.Rd

Simulates from a inverse gamma (a, b) distribution with density proportional to $y^(-a-1) exp(-b/y)$

rigamma(n, a, b)

Arguments

n

number of random numbers to be generated
a

inverse gamma shape parameter
b

inverse gamma rate parameter

Value

vector of n simulated draws

Examples

a=10
b=5
n=20
rigamma(n,a,b)
#>  [1] 0.7704036 0.8071678 0.7214630 0.4503128 0.7828566 0.5308887 0.3435468
#>  [8] 0.6049987 0.5461336 0.3739718 0.5737552 0.5936974 0.3625285 0.5010067
#> [15] 1.1029271 0.4954017 0.4975981 0.6487269 0.5502544 0.6882227
